string-array.name: location_array
string-array.item: I stay in the same locality as the patient
I stay in a different locality from the patient

string-array.name: frequency_of_contact_array
string-array.item: More than twice in a week

string-array.name: PHQ2_responses_array
string-array.item: More than half of the days

string-array.name: Adls_q1_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Bathes self completely or needs help in bathing only a single part of the body such as the back, genital area or disabled extremity.
b. Need help with bathing more than one part of the body, getting in or out of the tub or shower. Requires total bathing.

string-array.name: Adls_q2_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Get clothes from closets and drawers and puts on clothes and outer garments complete with fasteners. May have help tying shoes.
b. Needs help with dressing self or needs to be completely dressed.

string-array.name: Adls_q3_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Goes to toilet, gets on and off, arranges clothes, cleans genital area without help.
b. Needs help transferring to the toilet, cleaning self or uses bedpan or commode.

string-array.name: Adls_q4_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Moves in and out of bed or chair unassisted. Mechanical transfer aids are acceptable.
b. Needs help in moving from bed to chair or requires a complete transfer.

string-array.name: Adls_q5_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Exercises complete self- control over urination and defecation.
b. Is partially or totally incontinent of bowel or bladder.

string-array.name: Adls_q6_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Gets food from plate into mouth without help. Preparation of food may be done by another person.
b. Needs partial or total help with feeding or requires parenteral feeding.

string-array.name: iAdls_q1_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Operates telephone on own initiative-looks up and dials numbers, etc.
b. Dials a few well-known numbers
c. Answers telephone but does not dial
d. Does not use telephone at all

string-array.name: iAdls_q2_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Takes care of all shopping needs independently
b. Shops independently for small purchases
c. Needs to be accompanied on any shopping trip

string-array.name: iAdls_q3_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Plans, prepares and serves adequate meals independently
b. Prepares adequate meals if supplied with ingredients
c. Heats, serves and prepares meals, or prepares meals, or prepares meals but does not maintain adequate diet
d. Needs to have meals prepared and served

string-array.name: iAdls_q4_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Maintains house alone or with occasional assistance (e.g. "heavy work domestic help")
b. Performs light daily tasks such as dish washing, bed making
c. Performs light daily tasks but cannot maintain acceptable level of cleanliness
d. Needs help with all home maintenance tasks
e. Does not participate in any housekeeping

string-array.name: iAdls_q5_responses_array
string-array.item: b. Launders small items e.g. rinses stockings, etc.
c. All laundry must be done by others

string-array.name: iAdls_q6_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Travels independently on public transportation or drives own car
b. Arranges own travel via taxi, but does not otherwise use public transportation
c. Travels on public transportation when accompanied by another
d. Travel limited to taxi or automobile with assistance of another
e. Does not travel at all

string-array.name: iAdls_q7_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Is responsible for taking medication in correct dosages at correct time
b. Takes responsibility if medication is prepared in advance in separate dosage
c. Is not capable of dispensing own medication

string-array.name: iAdls_q8_responses_array
string-array.item: a. Manages financial matters independently (budgets, writes checks, pays rent, bills, goes to bank), collects/keeps track of income
b. Manages day-to-day purchases, but needs help with banking, major purchases, etc.
